title: What are the latest business news of August 21, 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Business news #13 - August 21, 2020. 1) Gold and silver prices in India rose by 1%.  Gold prices in India(Rs. 52000.0) have increased since yesterday(Rs. 51990.0).It was lower than the average gold price observed this week (Rs.52447.14) by 0.85%.2) Tesla Motors is now the world's most valuable automaker, is now worth more than Walmart  Tesla’s valuation is currently about $373.1 billion, while Walmart is hovering around $369.8 billion, according to Bloomberg data.*3) Rupee surges 11 paise to 74.91 against US dollar in early trade  4) Online retail giant Amazon has removed shirts from its platform. which featured derogatory references to Kamala Harris, the Democratic Vice Presidential nominee of the US.  5) Amazon Pay launches a digital gold investment service.  With this offering, Amazon Pay has joined the likes of Paytm, PhonePe, Google Pay, and Mobikwik who allow users to buy digital gold on their respective platforms. While Paytm launched the service in 2017, Mobikwik started offering gold investment on its platform in 2018.
